availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County farmer. Nicholas County native. Married Amanda T. Jennings Conway in 1857. Father of Will F. Conway, Bettie G. Conway, and Charles Lee Conway.

bibl.p: Charles Kerr, ed. History of Kentucky (Chicago: American Historical Society, 1922), 4:301. “Nathaniel Franklin ‘Frank’ Conway,” Find A Grave, May 30, 2015, Memorial # 147201852. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1847-1911, Ancestry, Marriages, Mason County, 1857. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 67.
